description: ClusterStarup describes the desired startup state and passed environment variables for a specific cluster.

desiredState.description: Desired startup state for any managed server started in this cluster. Legal values are RUNNING or ADMIN.

clusterName.description: Name of specific cluster to start.  Managed servers in the cluster will be started beginning with replicas instances.

podTemplate.description: Name of pod template.  If specified, operator will use this pod template as basis for generating the pods for server instances in this cluster.  More info: https://github.com/oracle/weblogic-kubernetes-operator/blob/develop/site/developer.md

replicas.description: Replicas is the desired number of managed servers running for this cluster.

env.description: Environment variables to pass while starting managed servers in this cluster.
